product_name: REI CoolMax Light Hiker Crew Socks
long_description: The REI CoolMax Light Hiker Crew Socks manage moisture well, making them a comfortable choice for hiking and everyday wear in warm weather. Breathable CoolMax(R) polyester wicks away moisture to keep feet drier. Lightweight cushioning enhances comfort. Stretch nylon provides durability; spandex yarns improve fit. Reinforced heels and toes stand up to wear and tear. REI CoolMax Light Hiker Crew Socks have a band that supports the arch and seamless toes that prevent chafing. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The REI CoolMax Light Hiker Crew Socks manage moisture well, making them a comfortable choice for hiking and everyday wear in warm weather.
